info.author: Nicolas
info.name: Police Cruiser Speed Camera
info.description: TICKET BABE LIGHT WEIGHT RONNIE COLEMAN BODY BUILDING

setting.name: *ticketTax
setting.description: Set the tax of the speeding fine. Default: 2000$

setting.name: *allowExit
setting.description: If you want to let players leave the car while speeding camera is on then change to true (not recommended) else let it false. Default: false (due to abuse)

setting.name: *rangeOfRadar
setting.description: Set the range of the speed camera. Default and recommended: 25
